name: Losing Your Head
description:
Made for Ludwig's Game Jam 2021.

For the best experience: Download the full executable. Browser Version does not include Music.

Controls:

WASD - Control Direction of Player

Spacebar - Hold to charge a jump and release to jump

E - Toggle between 1st and 3rd person

F - Interact

Shift - Reset Jump

------

Play a whole 1 level in this amazing fantastic awesome game where you are a box. Not only that, you are a box that can jump!

Be amazed by the amazing amazingness of 3 different NPCs! You might even run into a certain Mogul Mover on your way up!

Be the first to reach the top and receive nothing! That's right! Absolutely nothing!

Mom walking in the room? No problem! This game has a cute art style so she'll have no idea it's all about searching for your decapitated corpse!

Enter a new world full of disappointment and frustration, just like real life!
